statements: SELECT * FROM Suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND supplier_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price <= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers');
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_order_value FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_price < 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price, order_date FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, city, country FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, city FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, address, city, country FROM suppliers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
